document_data.caption: A map showing the River Abdo near the center of the Grey Jungle in east Zakhara.
document_data.name: Abdo River
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Abdo''' was a winding waterway found in the [[Cities of the Ancients|Ruined Kingdoms]] region of [[Zakhara|east Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: The river originated at the southern tip of [[Al-Sayaj Mountains]] where it flowed south before turning east to wind its way through the [[Grey Jungle]] before joining with the mighty [[Nogaro River]].
